scripts.style-js: npx eslint --ignore-pattern tests/www/vendor www tests/www doc/example.js
scripts.style-js-fix: npx eslint --ignore-pattern tests/www/vendor/ --fix www/ tests/www/ doc/example.js
scripts.style: npm run style-js-fix && npm run style-java
scripts.test: npm run style-js && npm run style-java
